author: Reuters Editorial
title: May says close to agreeing Brexit implementation period terms
text:
LONDON (Reuters) - said on Friday Britain was close to agreeing the terms with Brussels of an implementation period that will help smooth the countryâ€™s exit from the European Union.
Britain's delivers a speech about her vision for Brexit, at Mansion House in London, Britain, March 2, 2018. REUTERS/Leon Neal/Pool
Slideshow (3 Images) In a keenly awaited speech, May said the implementation period must be time-limited, cannot be a permanent solution and is vital to help businesses navigate Brexit.
Reporting by Alastair Smout and Andrew MacAskill; writing by Kate Holton; Editing by Stephen Addison
